Below is a list of active and completed team projects.  Feel free to contact the individuals involved for specific details.  If you would like to request assistance or make a suggestion for a team project please <nowiki>[[CaliforniaTeam-ContactUs|let us know]]</nowiki>.  If you are a team member, initiate a new team project on this page. Need to learn how, or what the requirements are? Check out our <nowiki>[[CaliforniaTeam-Projects-HowTo|Projects How-to]]</nowiki>!
